sources.title: Several days from the life of I. I. Oblomov
sources.description:
Based on the novel by Ivan Goncharov "Oblomov". Ilya Ilyich Oblomov, the owner of a small estate, spends all his time in idleness. His only close friend, Andrei Ivanovich Stolz, is trying to change his lifestyle. However, Oblomov takes on one thing, then another, and, having completed nothing, is always disappointed. The phenomenon, which the author called Oblomovism, stepped from the pages of the novel far beyond the framework of its time...

IMDb rating: 7,6

Year of production: 1979

Director: Nikita Mikhalkov
Writers: Adabashyan Alexander, Mikhalkov Nikita
Composer: Artemyev Eduard
Operator: Lebeshev Pavel
Production Designers: Samulekin Alexander, Adabashyan Alexander

Cast: Oleg Tabakov, Evgeny Steblov, Elena Solovey, Nikolai Pastukhov, Andrey Popov, Gleb Strizhenov, Yuri Bogatyrev, Evgenia Glushchenko, Leontiev Avangard, Oleg Kozlov, Elena Kleshchevskaya, Andrey Razumovsky

metadata.Plot: In this literary adaptation, the main character Oblomov spends his days resting in his dressing gown on a sofa, unable to make up his mind as contemplates a move, receives a visit from a friend, and becomes passionate about a youn...
metadata.Writer: Frédérique Moreau, Guillaume Gallienne, Volodia Serre
metadata.Actors: Yves Gasc, Céline Samie, Guillaume Gallienne
